name: Mech Invasion (Tiff_D)
description:
The game is a 2d first-person shooter heavily inspired 1986 Mobile Suit Z Gundam – Hot Scramble. The player will be playing as a pilot/soldier in a Mecha/Giant Robot shooting off waves of enemies wanting to invade your home within a time limit/before the enemies shoot down an atomic bomb onto your home. Your Commander Officer Meo will report on your current situation whether it is how many enemies there are left and how much health you have left.
